Package curam.util.transaction

Contains the classes useful for getting information regarding the currently executing transaction

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DatabaseConnection Utility class that provides a connection to the database.
SQLQueryCacheAdmin This class represents a public interface for the transaction SQL query cache to allow developers some control over it's behavior.
SQLQueryCacheUtil Contains utility methods for the transaction SQL query cache.
TimerInfo A manager class for timed events.
TransactionInfo Contains context information about the currently executing business function and its transaction context.
TransactionInfo.TransactionType Contains the constants returned by TransactionInfo.getTransactionType.
 

Package curam.util.transaction Description

Contains the classes useful for getting information regarding the currently executing transaction.

Since:
Curam SDEJ3.0.0
